content: this beginner-friendly scarf pattern uses just the single_crochet stitch and double_crochet stitch a video tutorial for this pattern is available on my youtube channel willow crochet scarf pattern 1 materials needed 410 yards of a dk/ #3 lightweight weight yarn 150g w/o fringe yarn used loops & threads luxe merino 4 50 mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors stitch markers optional > subscribe to my newsletter 2 to be notified when new patterns come out 1 https //youtu be/e9yatuwvso4 2 https //subscribepage io/mfhzxe
